RORALGO.RORALGO_SQL_STATEMENT: SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND ( SPRIDEN_PIDM IS NULL OR LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_PIDM,9,1),'0123456789',' '))) IS NOT NULL OR SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) IS NULL )
SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '5'
SELECT 'FASPSU' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '6' AND '7'
SELECT 'FALL' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '8'
SELECT 'SPRING' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '9'

SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND ( SPRIDEN_PIDM IS NULL OR LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_PIDM,9,1),'0123456789',' '))) IS NOT NULL OR SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) IS NULL )
SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '5'
SELECT 'FASPSU' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '6' AND '7'
SELECT 'FALL' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '8'
SELECT 'SPRING' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '9'

select 20000 from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_exp_enroll_status = '1' and (rcrapp1_yr_in_coll = '0' or rcrapp1_yr_in_coll = '1') and rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM
select 19000 from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_exp_enroll_status = '1' and rcrapp1_yr_in_coll = '2' and rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM
select 18000 from rcrapp1 where nvl(rcrapp1_exp_enroll_status,'1') = '1' and nvl(rcrapp1_yr_in_coll,'0') = '3' and rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM
select 17000 from rcrapp1 where nvl(rcrapp1_exp_enroll_status,'1') = '1' and nvl(rcrapp1_yr_in_coll,'0') = '4' and rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM

select 16000 from rcrapp1 where nvl(rcrapp1_exp_enroll_status,'1') = '1' and (nvl(rcrapp1_yr_in_coll,'0') < '4' and nvl(rcrapp1_yr_i n_coll,'0') < '7') and rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM
select 33000 from rcrapp1 where nvl(rcrapp1_exp_enroll_status,'1') = '1' and nvl(rcrapp1_yr_in_coll, '0') > '6' and rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM

select abs(nvl(rcrapp1_us_inc,'0')) from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y'
select round(abs(nvl(rcrapp1_par_us_inc,'0')),-2) * .10 from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y'
select 4000 from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and nvl(rcrapp1_us_inc,'0') >= '4000'
select 3000 from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and nvl(rcrapp1_us_inc,'0') >= '3000' and nvl(rcrapp1_us_inc,'0') < '4000'
select 2000 from rcrapp1 where rcrapp1_aidy_code = :AIDY and rcrapp1_pidm = :PIDM and rcrapp1_curr_rec_ind = 'Y' and nvl(rcrapp1_us_inc,'0') >= '2000' and nvl(rcrapp1_us_inc,'0') < '3000'

select rorstat_pckg_comp_date + 10 from rorstat where rorstat_aidy_code = :AIDY and rorstat_pidm = :PIDM and rorstat_pckg_comp_date is not null
select rorstat_pckg_comp_date + 20 from rorstat where rorstat_aidy_code = :AIDY and rorstat_pidm = :PIDM and rorstat_pckg_comp_date is not null

-- ==================== Default Year in College R ule ==================== -- DEFAULT-DYICP or STD_YICP_1 -- SAMPLE: Default Year In College for Periods Algorithmic Rule -- Purpose: The rule assigns the year in college for the specific -- period that a student is enrolled. It can be entered on -- RORALGO as either the default rule or used in RORPOST. -- Sequence 110 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as first year select 1 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) in ('0','1','5')

-- Sequence 120 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as sophomore select 3 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) = '2'

-- Sequence 130 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as junior select 4 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) in ('3','6')

-- Sequence 140 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as senior select 5 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) = '4'

-- Sequence 150 -- Graduate/Law students - range from 700-999 - set as first year select 7 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '700' and '999' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) in ('7','8')

-- Sequence 160 -- Graduate/Law students - range from 700-999 - set as returning select 8 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '700' and '999' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) = '9'
-- Sequence 170 -- default if none of the others apply select 1 from dual

SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND ( SPRIDEN_PIDM IS NULL OR LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_PIDM,9,1),'0123456789',' '))) IS NOT NULL OR SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) IS NULL )
SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '5'
SELECT 'FASPSU' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '6' AND '7'
SELECT 'FALL' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '8'
SELECT 'SPRING' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '9'

SELECT 'FASPSU' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '5'
SELECT 'FA/SPR' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '6' AND '7'
SELECT 'SPS1S2' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '8'
SELECT 'SPS1S2' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) = '9'
SELECT '5' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND ( SPRIDEN_PIDM IS NULL OR LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_PIDM,9,1),'0123456789',' '))) IS NOT NULL OR SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) IS NULL )
SELECT '5' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '1'
SELECT '4' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '2' AND '3'
SELECT '1' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '4' AND '5'
SELECT '2' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '6' AND '7'
SELECT '3' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '8' AND '9'

-- ==================== Default Year in College R ule ==================== -- DEFAULT-DYICP or STD_YICP_1 -- SAMPLE: Default Year In College for Periods Algorithmic Rule -- Purpose: The rule assigns the year in college for the specific -- period that a student is enrolled. It can be entered on -- RORALGO as either the default rule or used in RORPOST. -- Sequence 110 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as first year select 1 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) in ('0','1','5')

-- Sequence 120 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as sophomore select 3 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) = '2'

-- Sequence 130 -- Undergraduate students - range from 000-699 - set as junior select 4 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '000' and '699' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) in ('3','6')

-- Sequence 150 -- Graduate/Law students - range from 700-999 - set as first year select 7 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '700' and '999' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) in ('7','8')

-- Sequence 160 -- Graduate/Law students - range from 700-999 - set as returning select 8 from spriden where spriden_pidm = :pidm and substr(spriden_id,7,3) between '700' and '999' and substr(spriden_id,7,1) = '9'
-- Sequence 170 -- default if none of the others apply select 1 from dual
SELECT '1' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND ( SPRIDEN_PIDM IS NULL OR LENGTH(TRIM(TRANSLATE(SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_PIDM,9,1),'0123456789',' '))) IS NOT NULL OR SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) IS NULL )
SELECT '1' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '1'
SELECT '2' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '2' AND '3'
SELECT '3' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '4' AND '5'
SELECT '4' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '6' AND '7'
SELECT '5' FROM SPRIDEN WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM = :PIDM AND SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_ID,9,1) BETWEEN '8' AND '9'
